2894 int rlsCloseI2cIrqIf(rlsDevHandle_t hdl )
2895 {
2896  FT_STATUS ftStatus;
2897  rlsDevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (rlsDevCtx_t*)hdl;
2898  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2899  unsigned char Continue = 0;
2900 
2901  if (pDevCtx == NULL)
2902  {
2903  return RLS_RET_CODE_NULL_PTR_ERROR;
2904  }
2905 
2906  if ((pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle != 0))
2907  {
2908  ftStatus = FT_SetBitMode(pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle, 0x0, FT_BITMODE_RESET);
2909  ftStatus = FT_ResetPort(pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle);
2910  ftStatus = FT_Close(pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle);
2911  pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle = 0;
2912  }
2913 
2914  return RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2915 }
2916 
2931 int rlsI2CWrite( rlsDevHandle_t hdl, unsigned char slaveAddress,
2932  unsigned char regAddress, unsigned char msbData,
2933  unsigned char lsbData, int datasize )
2934 {
2935  rlsDevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (rlsDevCtx_t*)hdl;
2936  FT_STATUS ftStatus = FT_OK;
2937  int status = FALSE;
2938  BYTE i2cBuffer[100];
2939  DWORD i2cBytesToTransfer = 0;
2940  DWORD i2cBytesTransfered = 0;
2941  FT_HANDLE Hdl = 0;
2942  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
2943 
2944  if (pDevCtx == NULL)
2945  {
2946  return RLS_RET_CODE_NULL_PTR_ERROR;
2947  }
2948 
2949  Hdl = pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle;
2950 
2951  /*Setting Bit 0 to zero to enable write*/
2952  slaveAddress = (slaveAddress << 1) & 0xFE;
2953 
2954  /* wait for Port B to be free */
2955  WaitForSingleObject(rls_gIrqI2cMutex, INFINITE);
2956 
2957  /*Set START condition for I2C communication*/
2958  rlsHighSpeedSetI2CStart(i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
2959 
2960  if (datasize == 1)
2961  {
2962  /*Address of I2C slave for write*/
2963  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2964  &i2cBytesTransfered, slaveAddress);
2965  /*Send address byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
2966  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2967  &i2cBytesTransfered, regAddress);
2968  /*Send MSB byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
2969  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2970  &i2cBytesTransfered, msbData);
2971  }
2972 
2973  if (datasize == 2)
2974  {
2975  /*Address of I2C slave for write*/
2976  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2977  &i2cBytesTransfered, slaveAddress);
2978  /*Send address byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
2979  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2980  &i2cBytesTransfered, regAddress);
2981  /*Send MSB byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
2982  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2983  &i2cBytesTransfered, msbData);
2984  /*Send LSB byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
2985  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
2986  &i2cBytesTransfered, lsbData);
2987  }
2988 
2989  if (status == 1)
2990  {
2991  DEBUG_PRINT("Error in I2C Write\n");
2992  }
2993 
2994  /*Set STOP condition for I2C communication*/
2995  rlsHighSpeedSetI2CStop(i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
2996 
2997  /*Send off the commands*/
2998  ftStatus |= FT_Write(Hdl, i2cBuffer, i2cBytesToTransfer,
2999  &i2cBytesTransfered);
3000  i2cBytesToTransfer = 0; /*Clear output buffer*/
3001 
3002 
3003  Sleep(1); /*Delay for a while to ensure write is completed*/
3004 
3005  /* Signal that the port B can be used*/
3006  ReleaseMutex(rls_gIrqI2cMutex);
3007 
3008  if (status == TRUE)
3009  status = 0;
3010  else
3011  status = 1;
3012 
3013  return status;
3014 }
3015 
3030 int rlsI2CRead( rlsDevHandle_t hdl, unsigned char slaveAddress,
3031  unsigned char regAddress, unsigned char *msbData,
3032  unsigned char *lsbData, int datasize )
3033 {
3034  rlsDevCtx_t* pDevCtx = (rlsDevCtx_t*)hdl;
3035  FT_STATUS ftStatus;
3036  int status;
3037  BYTE i2cBuffer[100];
3038  DWORD i2cBytesToTransfer = 0;
3039  DWORD i2cBytesTransfered = 0;
3040  unsigned char i2cSlaveAddress;
3041  FT_HANDLE Hdl = 0;
3042  int error = RLS_RET_CODE_OK;
3043 
3044  if (pDevCtx == NULL)
3045  {
3046  return RLS_RET_CODE_NULL_PTR_ERROR;
3047  }
3048 
3049  Hdl = pDevCtx->irqI2cHandle;
3050 
3051  /*Setting Bit 0 to zero to enable write*/
3052  i2cSlaveAddress = (slaveAddress << 1) & 0xFE;
3053 
3054  /* wait for Port B to be free */
3055  WaitForSingleObject(rls_gIrqI2cMutex, INFINITE);
3056 
3057  /*Purge USB receive buffer first before read operation*/
3058  /*Get the number of bytes in the device receive buffer*/
3059  ftStatus = FT_GetQueueStatus(Hdl, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
3060  if ((ftStatus == FT_OK) && (i2cBytesToTransfer > 0))
3061  {
3062  /*Read out all the data from receive buffer*/
3063  FT_Read(Hdl, i2cBuffer, i2cBytesToTransfer, &i2cBytesTransfered);
3064  }
3065 
3066  ftStatus = FT_OK;
3067  /*Set START condition for I2C communication*/
3068  rlsHighSpeedSetI2CStart(i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
3069  /*Send slave address for write and check if ACK bit is received.*/
3070  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer, \
3071  &i2cBytesTransfered, i2cSlaveAddress);
3072  /*Send Register address byte and check if ACK bit is received*/
3073  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer, \
3074  &i2cBytesTransfered, regAddress);
3075 
3076  /*Set START condition for I2C communication*/
3077  rlsHighSpeedSetI2CStart(i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
3078 
3079  /*Setting Bit 0 to one to enable read*/
3080  i2cSlaveAddress = (slaveAddress << 1) | 0x01;
3081  /*Send slave address for read and check ACK bit*/
3082  status = rlsI2CSendByteAndCheckACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer, \
3083  &i2cBytesTransfered, i2cSlaveAddress);
3084 
3085  if (datasize == 1)
3086  {
3087  status = rlsI2CReadByteAndSendNACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
3088  &i2cBytesTransfered, msbData);
3089  }
3090 
3091  if (datasize == 2)
3092  {
3093  /* Reading MSB data */
3094  status = rlsI2CReadByteAndSendACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
3095  &i2cBytesTransfered, msbData);
3096  /* Reading LSB data */
3097  status = rlsI2CReadByteAndSendNACK(Hdl, i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer,\
3098  &i2cBytesTransfered, lsbData);
3099  }
3100 
3101  /*Set STOP condition for I2C communication*/
3102  rlsHighSpeedSetI2CStop(i2cBuffer, &i2cBytesToTransfer);
3103 
3104  /*Send off the commands*/
3105  ftStatus |= FT_Write(Hdl, i2cBuffer, i2cBytesToTransfer,
3106  &i2cBytesTransfered);
3107  i2cBytesToTransfer = 0; /*Clear output buffer*/
3108 
3109  Sleep(1); /*Delay for a while to ensure read is completed*/
3110 
3111  /* Signal that the port B can be used*/
3112  ReleaseMutex(rls_gIrqI2cMutex);
3113 
3114  if (status == TRUE)
3115  status = 0;
3116  else
3117  status = 1;
3118 
3119  return status;
3120 }
